description: This creamy tomato and cucumber salad is a staple on Ukrainian tables in summer time, perfect for mopping up with crusty bread.
keywords: Greek salad,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Tomato & Cucumber Salad with Dill Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Toss the chopped tomatoes and cucumber in a bowl and season generously. Tip in the spring onions and add the sour cream. Mix well to coat, stir through chopped dill and serve.
